resources.string: - New setting, unlock slide distance\n - Preview general behavior and settings\n - Add \'about\' menu
- Fix bug, sheet preview after unlock\n - Start Lingua Lock automatically on boot

- Support Japanese Launguage
 - Change application icon
 - Title bar is ActionBar like Android 4.0
 - Max icon number on dock is 5
 - Analog clock widget is default
 - Changeable veil transparency
 - Support home screen wallpaper
 - Add ADW Theme detail page
 - Fix many small bugs
- \'Back and Restore\' menu\n - Minor bug fix
